entry.title: The Cannabis Administration and Opportunity Act of 2022- What Will it Do?
entry.summary: Senate leaders introduced legislation Thursday to remove federal prohibitions on marijuana a half of a century after Congress deemed it illegal. Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer has proposed the Cannabis Administration and Opportunity Act that would federally decriminalize weed and allow states to form their marijuana laws without retribution from Washington D.C. entry.title: Cannabinoids 101: What Makes Cannabis Medicine?

entry.title: What is 710 Day?
entry.summary: Within cannabis culture, 710 Day is basically International Dab Day according to Urban Dictionary. 710 is considered a holiday celebrated on July 10th for many cannabis consumers that enjoy cannabis oil products like dabs or concentrates. The term 710 rotated and upside down spells OIL, a word used to describe these highly potent cannabis products. [...]
